import React from 'react' export default function About() { return (

Cu chuyn v Coolmate

y l chuyn mc gip cc bn bit c Coolmate hnh thnh ra sao v chng ti mun xy dng mt cng ty nh th no!

Collmate sinh ra
lm g ?

Phi chia s tht l rt nhiu ngi t cu hi ny cho i ng Coolmate, nhng gn y, khi Coolmate bc sang 3 tui th chng ti mi c c cu tr li mt cch r rng v t tin cho cu hi ny.

Coolmate sinh ra vi mong mun tr thnh in hnh v m hnh DOANH NGHIP TRCH NHIM bng cch va lm kinh doanh bi bn, c li nhun v ng thi mang li nhng gi tr thit thc v lu di cho khch hng, cho nhn vin, cho i tc, cho cng ng, x hi v cho c ng"

Coolmate thnh lp vo thng 3/2019, Nhu (CEO), Hip (CTO) v Lan (CMO) khi u vi mt nh kho 20m2, v mt Website bn hng s khai, vi cc sn phm rt c bn dnh cho nam gii nh o thun, bt tt v lt. Sau 3 nm, th ngy hm nay Coolmate c s trng thnh ng k.

Coolmate vn bn o thun, lt v bt tt, v cng c thm kh nhiu cc sn phm khc trong t nam gii nh cc mc i chi, mc i lm, hay chi th thao. Chng ti cng bn c m, c khu trang, khn mt v 1 s o in dnh tin quyn gp cho mt s qu t thin (danh mc Care & Share). Coolmate cn c thm dch v lm cc sn phm in n theo yu cu (dch v CoolxPrint), v l n v tin phong vi m hnh giao lt nh k u tin ti Vit Nam (dch v CoolSub).

V chc chn l chng ti s khng dng li nhng th . Coolmate s m rng hn cc sn phm, dch v xoay quanh nhu cu ca nam gii. Nn mt ngy p tri, nu nh m bn tm thy mt i giy, b dao co ru, hay mt l ln kh mi hay thm ch l nhng chic bao cao su cht lng Website th cng ng ngc nhin nh.

Sau 3 nm chng ti cng c gn 2000m2 vn phng v kho vn hnh ti H Ni v H Ch Minh. Gia nh Coolmate cng ln ti gn 100 thnh vin. S lng n hng m Coolmate x l ti thi im hin ti ln ti con s gn 1 triu.

Coolmate cng c s tng trng nhanh v doanh s v cng c mt cht li nhun, v c nhiu hn cc qu u t rt vn vo Coolmate ( Tham kho thm hnh trnh ca Collmate)

Coolmate s tr thnh in hnh v m hnh DOANH NGHIP TRCH NHIM
bng cch kinh doanh t t, c li nhun v mang li nhng gi tr thit thc v lu di
cho khch hng, cho nhn vin, cho i tc, cho cng ng, cho mi trng v cho c ng

Nhu Phm, CEO & Founder Coolmate
i ng CSKH ti Collmate
Cu chuyn dch v khch Hng
ca Coolmate

Theo mt kho st gn y nht ca Coolmate t thc hin th c ti 51% khch hng quyt nh mua sm Coolmate v n tng vi dch v khch hng. 94% khch hng sn sng gii thiu Coolmate vi nhng ngi khc.

Coolmate, chng ti tin rng vic bn mt gi hng l bn c mt tri nghim mua sm. Coolmate c k vng tr thnh mt thng hiu in hnh v vic hng ti khch hng mt cch su sc ti Vit Nam. Vi mong mun gp mt phn nh thay i nhn thc ca cc doanh nghip trong vic mang ti nhng tri nghim tt hn cho khch hng, c bit trong lnh vc Thng Mi in T.

Coolmate l thng hiu u tin v hin ti vn l duy nht c chnh sch i tr MIN PH v ln ti 60 ngy vi bt c l do g. Chng ti xy dng c vic i hng v ly hng tr v tn nh khch hng, thm ch chng ti thng xuyn gi sn phm mi cho khch hng trc khi cn thu hi sn phm c v. V iu vui mng l gn y c nhiu hn cc n v vn chuyn cho dch v ny v ph bin hn cc bn bn hng Online.

Vic ng gi mt hp vi Double Box cng c Coolmate i tin phong t cch y 2 nm, v tr thnh ph bin nhiu hn cc thng hiu khc.

Nu bn th hi CSKH Coolmate mt tim Pizza ngon quanh khu vc ca bn th chc cc bn y cng s c gng tm v gi cho bn mt a ch ph hp !

Cu chuyn v m hnh doanh nghip C TRCH NHIM
Coolmate ang hng ti

#1.Vi khch hng

Coolmate k vng mang li sn phm cht lng hn nh m hnh qun l chui cung ng t gc (vi ngnh may mc l t si), Coolmate cng c cc i tc quy m ton cu, v cht lng v nguyn liu t tiu chun cao trong ngnh may mc, c th so snh vi cc thng hiu ln v lu i.

Ngoi ra m hnh bn hng trc tip (Ecommerce D2C) cho php Coolmate c u t nhiu hn cho phn sn xut thay v phi lin tc ct gim gi vn nh cc m hnh truyn thng! Thc t khch hng s thy c cht lng cc sn phm Coolmate ci thin ng k trong nm gn y v chc chn trong tng lai na.

Coolmate k vng mang li gi c tt hn cho khch hng nh vo m hnh bn hng trc tip thng qua nn tng TMT. Thay v vic phi bn gi sn phm x4-x6 ln gi vn nh truyn thng th Coolmate thng l x1.8-x2.5 ln m chng ti vn c phn li nht nh. Ngoi ra Coolmate cn hng ti mang li mt tri nghim mua sm tt hn dnh cho khch hng nh vo vic tp trung rt nhiu vo dch v khch hng(tham kho 11 cam kt ca Coolmate dnh cho khch hng)

nh ti Coolmate Hub

#2.Vi nhn vin Coolmate

Coolmate k vng s xy dng c mt t chc ci m, mt mi trng nng ng vi mt vn ha ring (tham kho vn ha Coolmate). V cc bn tr s pht huy ht kh nng ca mnh, v nhn c nhng phn lng, thng xng ng. Ngoi lng th cc bn nhn vin ca Coolmate cn nhn c cc ESOP (c phn thng) hng nm nu c ng gp tt.

nh cc bn nhn vin HCM vo sinh nht Coolmate 3

#3.i vi i tc Coolmate

Coolmate lm trong ngy may mc. Mt ngnh m l th mnh ca Vit Nam, tuy nhin th i sng ca nhng ngi cng nhn may cha bao gi c m bo tt. Vic gim chi ph gia cng tng sc cnh tranh cho sn phm l chin lc c cc thng hiu ln lin tc p dng. Coolmate mun thay i iu bng vic lun c gng tr nhiu hn cho nhng ngi th may nu c th (Yu cu cc i tc phi ng bo him cho ngi lao ng l mt v d).

Ngoi ra th Coolmate cng c nhiu hot ng h tr cc bn cng nhn may khc nh chm sc cc bn F0, h tr giai on thiu vic lm, hay l vic theo ui m hnh sn xut cht lng, thay v gi r. Coolmate k vng rng s gp mt phn vo vic thay i nhn thc ca cc thng hiu v mi quan h vi cc xng sn xut, v i sng ngi lao ng. M hnh lao ng gi r ca ngnh dt may khng phi l m hnh bn vng v c gi tr lu di trong tng lai.

nh ti cc xng sn xut i tc

#4.Vi mi trng

Dt may l ngnh gy ra nhim mi trng ln th 2 trn th gii ch sau ngnh giy. Coolmate ang c gng chuyn mnh theo hng Substainability - Thi trang bn vng hn hin ti v trong tng lai. Bng chng l dng sn phm Excool vi si Sorona thn thin vi mi trng hn nhiu so vi si Polyester thng. D n kt hp vi Cleandye, cng ngh nhum sch, khng nc cng to ra cc sn phm thn thin hn vi mi trng. Vi dng cc sn phm th thao Coolmate hng ti vic ng dng trn 50% si ti ch (Recycled Polyester) trong cc dng sn phm ca mnh trong nm 2022 v hng ti 99% trong nm 2023 tr i.

nh mt cng on trong qu trnh nhum sch CleanDye

#5.Vi cc c ng

Vic duy tr mt m hnh kinh doanh bi bn, c li nhun n nh v tng trng nh l mt cam kt ca Coolmate cho c ng v vic c c nhng li nhun v s tng gi tr trong di hn.

i ng Coolmate c rt nhiu nhng d nh v nhng c m ln, tuy nhin th chng ti bt u t nhng th nh nht, v bc tng bc trn chng ng i ca mnh, chm ch v c gng lm tt tng ngy. Coolmate khng coi bt c ai l i th cnh tranh ngoi chnh bn thn mnh. Tt hn mi ngy - Better Everyday l th m chng ti theo ui.

nh i ng Coolmate v Nh u t 500 Startup

#6.Vi cng ng x hi

Coolmate c gng m rng, to nhiu vic lm v ng thu y nh mt phn ng gp cho s pht trin chung ca x hi.

Quan im ca Coolmate v vic lm cc hot ng ng gp cho cng ng:Mt doanh nghip khng cn phi ln, mi c th lm iu ngha. Chnh v vy Coolmate m ra d n Care & Share vi mc tiu gp phn h tr cho cc tr em kh khn Vit Nam ngay t khi mi thnh lp cng ty c 1 nm. (tham kho thm d n Care & Share). Chc chn trong thi gian ti s c y mnh hn v h tr c nhiu hn.

nh d n o xy trng c nhiu khch hng quan tm & lan ta

Trong cuc sng c qu nhiu s la chn,
Cm n bn chn Collmate!

Tri nghim mua sm
vi Coolmate
Nu bn thch
gia nhp Coolmate
